title: Boppo's bike ride
creator_contributor_role: South West Institute of TAFE, production company

Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel

abstract: One man's journey through place and time
description: A grandfather/grandaughter collaboration, this is one man's journey through place and time from the 1930s-1960s. Ivan Couzens reminisces about the days when riding a bike was the only way to get around; school was a five mile ride away; and when he started work at the Bluestone quarries, the bicycle was his only mode of transport. A light-hearted look at the past interspersed with photographs and images of places once travelled. Music: "Greenflower" by Rob Bundle. Created as part of the "Bute Utes the Movie" project in association with Regional Arts Victoria.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000602; Selected works from "Bute utes: the movie"; Active; 2003
